titles.title: Raid on Radon Tax Credit Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax for the purchase and installation of equipment to test for radon and to remove radon from the air and water.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Introduced. Raid on Radon Tax Credit Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for 30 percent (up to $1,500) of the cost of purchasing and installing equipment to test for and remove radon from the air and water.
